set_milestones_lr(epoch, milestones, lr_list)¶
参数

  • epoch –

  • milestones – [ 35, 65, 95, 150]

  • lr_list – [0.1, 0.01, 0.001, 0.0001, 0.00001]

basetrainer.scheduler.MultiStepValue module¶

@Author : panjq @E-mail : pan_jinquan@163.com @Date : 2021-01-25 18:39:09

class basetrainer.scheduler.MultiStepValue.MultiStepValue(epochs, steps_per_epoch, milestones, val_list=[], val_init=0.01, val_end=0, num_warn_up=0, decay_rates=None)¶

基类：object

get_val()¶
set_val(epoch, total_step)¶

Usage: for epoch in range(epochs):

for i in range(steps_per_epoch):

scheduler.on_step(steps_per_epoch * epoch + i) …

参数

total_step – total step: steps_per_epoch * epoch + step

返回

step(epoch, step=0)¶

basetrainer.scheduler.WarmUpLR module¶

@Author : panjq @E-mail : pan_jinquan@163.com @Date : 2021-08-13 09:13:03

class basetrainer.scheduler.WarmUpLR.WarmUpLR(optimizer, num_steps, lr_init=0.01, num_warn_up=0)¶

基类：basetrainer.callbacks.callbacks.Callback

warmup_training learning rate scheduler :param optimizer: optimzier(e.g. SGD) :param total_iters: totoal_iters of warmup phase

get_lr(total_step)¶

we will use the first m batches, and set the learning rate to base_lr * m / total_iters

on_batch_end(batch, logs: dict = {})¶

每次迭代结束时回调

on_epoch_begin(epoch, logs: dict = {})¶

每个epoch开始时回调

set_lr(lr)¶
step(epoch=0, step=0)¶
